public interface QueryBuilder

A QueryBuilder builds a Query from a String.

          Construct a query from a string.
 

方法详细信息

parse

Query parse(java.lang.String aQuery)
Construct a query from a string.

参数：
aQuery - The text to convert
返回：
a query.
